resources.string: Shenley lane Community Association and Sports Centre, 472 Shenley Lane, Northfield, Birmingham, B29 4HZ

Shenley Fields SYS are based in Northfield, Birmingham and play around 30 matches each season. The standard is equivalent to a reasonable clubs 2nd or 3rd XI and we welcome players of all ages and abilities. In 2015 Shenley Fields has successfully entered a second side into the Warwickshire league.
